returns._0: The address of the BN254 certificate verifier
The address of the ECDSA certificate verifier

createTask((address,(address,uint32),byt.details: If the operator set has its fee token set, call `IAVSTaskHook.calculateTaskFee()` to get the fee for the task and approve the TaskMailbox for the fee before calling this function.

returns.taskHash: Unique identifier of the created task

returns._0: The fee split in basis points
The address that receives fee splits

params.cert: The certificate to get the bytes of
The certificate to get the bytes of

params.operatorSet: The operator set to get configuration for

returns._0: Task configuration for the operator set

params.feeSplit: The initial fee split in basis points
params.feeSplitCollector: The initial fee split collector address

params.operatorSetKey: Key of the operator set to check

returns._0: True if the executor operator set is registered, false otherwise

refundFee(bytes32).details: Can only be called by the refund collector for expired tasks

registerExecutorOperatorSet((address,uin.details: This function can be called to toggle the registration once the task config has been set.

params.isRegistered: Whether the operator set is registered

setExecutorOperatorSetTaskConfig((addres.details: Fees can be switched off by setting the fee token to the zero address.

params.config: Task configuration for the operator set

params.feeSplit: The fee split in basis points (0-10000)

params.feeSplitCollector: The address to receive fee splits

params.executorCert: Certificate proving the validity of the result

BN254_CERTIFICATE_VERIFIER().notice: Gets the BN254 certificate verifier address

ECDSA_CERTIFICATE_VERIFIER().notice: Gets the ECDSA certificate verifier address

feeSplit().notice: Gets the current fee split percentage

feeSplitCollector().notice: Gets the current fee split collector address

getBN254CertificateBytes((uint32,bytes32.notice: Gets the bytes of a BN254 certificate

getECDSACertificateBytes((uint32,bytes32.notice: Gets the bytes of a ECDSA certificate

getExecutorOperatorSetTaskConfig((addres.notice: Gets the task configuration for an executor operator set

getTaskInfo(bytes32).notice: Gets complete information about a task

getTaskResult(bytes32).notice: Gets the result of a verified task

getTaskStatus(bytes32).notice: Gets the current status of a task

isExecutorOperatorSetRegistered(bytes32).notice: Checks if an executor operator set is registered

refundFee(bytes32).notice: Refunds the fee for an expired task

registerExecutorOperatorSet((address,uin.notice: Registers an executor operator set with the TaskMailbox

setExecutorOperatorSetTaskConfig((addres.notice: Sets the task configuration for an executor operator set

setFeeSplitCollector(address).notice: Sets the fee split collector address

submitResult(bytes32,bytes,bytes).notice: Submits the result of a task execution
